Actually, you're quite right, that email wasn't from you (cardhead). 
To the person who sent out that fake email, and the fake one they 
sent to me, you fail to fully understand what you were doing, and 
have given yourself away. The last time (or few times) it happened 
was a long time ago, and I chose to ignore it, but this time I'll be 
talking to you.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> This email IS NOT MINE.  I don't know what happened, but this is 
not 
> one of my posts.
> 
> For one thing, I don't get the emails delivered to my inbox, I 
come 
> to the site and look them up myself, unlike some people who are 
too 
> lazy to set a bookmark.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > I don't mean to cause any trouble, it is just that I'd rather 
not 
> be bothered having my inbox flooded with emails advertising 
this "New 
> World Order" that they say will "revolutionize" Neo Beast Wars RPG.
